content:
-
本件保存七年
C2-62- 163 1 MEMORANDUM
May 23, 2
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chang
Subject
: Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX (99-471)
Reference is made to the attached Reports of Excess Equipment and copy of JGWhite letter dated May 18, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4.
In the above letter, JGWhite recommended that transformers and electric wire be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan. sion
Encl.Reports copy of JGWhite letter cc: JGWhite
BES (with copy of JGWhite letter) 2D # # ( > CSK/sml
